knimeNode.name: Background Remover
knimeNode.shortDescription: Removes the reference background from all mass spectra.

fullDescription.intro:
Thoroughly removes the background of the sample by iteratively scanning a pre-defined time window in a blank control sample for noise for every data point in all scans within a pre-defined mass window.
Zhang, H., Yang, Y. (2008). An algorithm for thorough background subtraction from high-resolution LC / MS data : application for detection of glutathione-trapped reactive metabolites, (February), 1181-1190. doi:10.1002/jms
fullDescription.option: The time window in seconds defining the scan range in the background control.
The mass tolerance in ppm for background data point sampling.
The factor by which the background intensity should be scaled.

ports.inPort: Table containing the background mass spec data.
ports.outPort: Table containing background-removed mass spec data.
